meanings.definition: Imitating or copying someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The mimical parrot repeated everything I said.
meanings.sent2: Her mimical gestures made her a great actress.
meanings.sent3: The mimical monkey made funny faces at the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The mimical chameleon blended perfectly with its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The mimical mime artist entertained the crowd with silent acts.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a mimic.
meanings.sent1: The mimical behavior of the robot was impressive.
meanings.sent2: His mimical expressions were so accurate, it was like watching a mirror.
meanings.sent3: The mimical clown made everyone laugh with his exaggerated movements.
meanings.sent4: The mimical wind whispered through the trees, mimicking voices.
meanings.sent5: The mimical mask looked so real, it was hard to tell it apart from a face.
